beast.templateinfo:
template for standard phylogenetic analysis,
supporting tip-date analysis and calibrations

subtemplate.suppressInputs: beast.gss.NS.operator, beast.gss.NS.operatorschedule, beast.gss.NS.state, beast.gss.NS.distribution, beast.gss.NS.samplingDistribution, beast.gss.NS.stopFactor, beast.gss.NS.preBurnin, beast.gss.NS.init

mergewith.subtemplate:
<run spec="beast.gss.NS" id="NS" chainLength="20000" particleCount="1" epsilon="1e-10">
<state storeEvery='5000' id='state'> </state>
<distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="posterior"> <distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="prior"> </distribution> <distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="likelihood" useThreads="true"> </distribution> </distribution>
<logger id='tracelog' spec="beast.core.Logger" logEvery="1000" fileName="beast.log" sort="smart" sanitiseHeaders='true'> <model idref='posterior'/> <log idref="posterior"/> <log idref="likelihood"/> <log idref="prior"/> </logger>
<logger id='screenlog' logEvery="1000"> <log idref="posterior"/> <ESS spec='ESS' name='log' arg="@posterior"/> <log idref="likelihood"/> <log idref="prior"/> </logger> </run>

<run id='PathSampler' spec='beast.inference.PathSampler' chainLength="1000000" alpha='0.3' rootdir='/tmp/step' burnInPercentage='50' preBurnin="50000" deleteOldLogs='true' nrOfSteps='100'> cd $(dir) java -cp $(java.class.path) beast.app.beastapp.BeastMain $(resume/overwrite) -java -seed $(seed) beast.xml
<mcmc spec="MCMC" id="mcmc" chainLength="1000000">
<state storeEvery='5000' id='state'> </state>
<distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="posterior"> <distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="prior"> </distribution> <distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="likelihood" useThreads="true"> </distribution> </distribution>
<logger id='tracelog' spec="beast.gss.NSLogger" logEvery="1000" fileName="beast.log" sort="smart" sanitiseHeaders='true'> <model idref='posterior'/> <log idref="posterior"/> <log idref="likelihood"/> <log idref="prior"/> </logger>
<logger id='screenlog' logEvery="1000"> <log idref="posterior"/> <ESS spec='ESS' name='log' arg="@posterior"/> <log idref="likelihood"/> <log idref="prior"/> </logger> </mcmc>
</run>

<run spec="MCMC" id="mcmc" chainLength="1000000">
<state storeEvery='5000' id='state'> </state>
<distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="posterior"> <distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="prior"> </distribution> <distribution spec="CompoundDistribution" id="likelihood" useThreads="true"> </distribution> </distribution>
<logger id='tracelog' spec="beast.gss.NSLogger" logEvery="1000" fileName="beast.log" sort="smart" sanitiseHeaders='true'> <model idref='posterior'/> <log idref="posterior"/> <log idref="likelihood"/> <log idref="prior"/> </logger>
<logger id='screenlog' logEvery="1000"> <log idref="posterior"/> <ESS spec='ESS' name='log' arg="@posterior"/> <log idref="likelihood"/> <log idref="prior"/> </logger> </run>
